rows.label: tlk45300143_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Mercs who haven't been assigned
missions undergo training here.

rows.label: tlk45300143_01_msg0002
rows.name: Launch a toppled enemy into the air!

rows.label: tlk45300143_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Then focus your attacks on it and
deal it some major damage!

rows.label: tlk45300143_01_msg0004
rows.name:
And finally, finish it off with a good old
smash!

rows.label: tlk45300143_01_msg0005
rows.name:
...That's what I keep telling 'em, but
they can't seem to get it right.

rows.label: tlk45300143_01_msg0006
rows.name:
They'll never be able do all of that by
themselves. You need teamwork, that's
what. Eh, they'll work it out eventually.
